channel.title: Azure on NS News and Views
channel.description: Recent content in Azure on NS News and Views

item.title: Automating Azure App Registrations with PowerShell
item.description: It has been a while since I last blogged - life has certainly been busy! Over the past two years I’ve somewhat immersed myself in PowerShell. While I wouldn’t claim to be a PowerShell Guru, my knowledge has substantially grown, thanks in part to splendid collaboration with some exceptional colleagues.
